head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HENDLER, FAY R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HENDLER, FAY R.

block.p: HENDLER-Fay R. On September 26, 2000, at the age of 88. Beloved wife of the late Aaron T. Hendler, and beloved sister of Jack Rosenstock. Cherished mother of Susan and Ronald Cohen, Merry and Martin Lapidus, and Hilary Hendler. Adored grandmother of Beth and Ted Snyder, Adrienne Cohen, Heather Lapidus, and Richard Lapidus. Services September 28, 2000, 1:30 P.M. at ''The Riverside'' Broad Street, Mount Vernon, NY. In lieu of flowers, contributions in Fay's memory may be made to The American Parkinson Foundation or the charity of your choice.

In lieu of flowers, contributions in Fay's memory may be made to The American Parkinson Foundation or the charity of your choice.
